senses.sense_definition: Relating to the Ottoman Empire, its people, or the dynasty of Osman.

examples.text: The <w>Osmanli</w> dynasty ruled a vast territory for over six centuries.
Researchers analyzed the <w>Osmanli</w> Turkish documents found in the archives.

senses.sense_definition: A subject of the Ottoman Empire or a member of the Ottoman dynasty.

examples.text: The <w>Osmanlis</w> left a lasting architectural legacy across the region.
Historians often debate the military strategies used by the <w>Osmanlis</w>.
